name: Funeral Racer
description:
This is my submission to "GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam". 

Theme was DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING! 

Game is about delivering coffins to cemetery. Time is running :)

Track is not long but containing two main obstacles. Wind mill and train.

But those would not be only problems during delivery.

To deliver coffins you would use vehicles - currently there are 2 available. Switching between them by using X key. And enjoy destructing them on the way :)

At the start position load as many coffins as you want (pressing Q key). Measuring time starts when 1st coffin is dropped.

Follow the track towards graveyard. Coffins would be automatically unloaded there. Press R key to transfer to start or just drive to start. 

Load more coffins. Deliver those coffins. Repeat until 20 coffins are delivered.

Controls

WSAD - driving 

Space Bar - hand brake 

Q - drop coffin 

R - Car to start location  (good for quick transfer to start after delivering coffins or you just stuck somewhere) 

X - Change car (currently 2 cars)

To start Game press Space Bar

I hope you would enjoy this game. 

Included also windows executable for download - graphics there is much better than in browser. One issue - quitting game is possible only by pressing Alt+F4.

Only sounds are not my creations (free of course) - everything else - source code, models was created by me.
